summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of the alley in block 11, Squire Park Addition, being the alley between 14th Avenue and 15th Avenue, extending from East Jefferson Street to East Alder Street, by grading and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 8211 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
